title: Russia says 79,702 civilians evacuated from Syria's eastern Ghouta
text: March 20, 2018 / 5:14 AM / Updated an hour ago Russia says 79,702 civilians evacuated from Syria's eastern Ghouta Reuters Staff 1 Min Read MOSCOW (Reuters) - The total number of civilians, mostly children, who have been evacuated from Syriaâ€™s besieged eastern Ghouta district since the start of a humanitarian operation has risen to 79,702, Russian defense ministry said on Tuesday. A man reacts as he hugs a child during evacuation in the besieged town of Douma, Eastern Ghouta, in Damascus, Syria March 19, 2018. REUTERS/Bassam Khabieh It said in a statement posted on its website that on Monday, 6,046 civilians left the district via humanitarian corridors. Reporting by Vladimir Soldatkin; Editing by Michael Perry
